attributes.action: Cap the pay of all highly paid celebrities  to the same as an nhs consultant
attributes.background: No sportsman, actor, tv presenter or other so called celebrity should be paid more than an nhs consultant. They may have sponsorship but no more than the pay of a nurse. No sports event, tv or otherwise competition shall have a prize money of more than twice, the said annual pay of a hospital doctor

rejection.details:
This is a matter for individual employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign some of these petitions: 

 

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073  

 

Give NHS staff a one off bonus for their help with Covid 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321150 

 

Reward our healthcare heroes now for risking their lives to fight Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318741 

 

Give NHS staff a pay rise in line with MPs pay increase: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513 

 

Pay all NHS Staff at least the Real Living Wage: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310615 

 

Incentivise NHS staff during the COVID19 outbreak by making wages untaxable: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595 

 

Increase National Insurance by 5 pence to Increase Salaries for all NHS Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310518 

 

Award all nursing staff in the NHS pay rise of 10% 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316307 

 

NHS benefits/perks 

 

Fund after care for all NHS staff following coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313439 

 

Fund free Travel, Parking, Hotel & Childcare during COVID-19 for NHS staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305854 

 

Fund free meals for NHS staff whilst on duty during the COVID19 Pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303485 

 

Supply NHS key frontline staff working during Covid-19 healthy food hampers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306339 

 

Fund increased death in service benefits for NHS staff who die during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307592 

 

Fund council tax for our all our NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313416
